Source

Class WaitCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • Source.Cell
      • Source.WaitCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CellInterface

    public class WaitCell
extends Cell
    A WaitCell keeps the player for a number of turns.

    A WaitCell is characterized by the following informations :

    • A waiting time which represents the number of turns to wait.
    • A waiting counter which is decremented each turn.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leo JUMEL et Brice NUZZO

      • canBeLeftNow

        public boolean canBeLeftNow()
        Indicates if a cell holds a player until another player reaches the same cell.
        Specified by:
        canBeLeftNow in interface CellInterface
        Overrides:
        canBeLeftNow in class Cell
        Returns:
        true if and only if the only way for a player to get out of this cell is for another player to replace him

      • getWaitingCounter

        public int getWaitingCounter()
        Indicates the number of round before the player is released.
        Returns:
        a number between 0 and 2.
